<PageSchema>
  <pageforms_Form name="Member">
    <standardInputs inputFreeText="1" freeTextLabel="Free text"/>
  </pageforms_Form>
  <Template name="Member" format="standard">
    <pageforms_TemplateDetails/>
    <semanticmediawiki_ConnectingProperty name=""/>
    <Field name="Full Name">
      <pageforms_FormInput>
        <InputType>text</InputType>
      </pageforms_FormInput>
      <semanticmediawiki_Property name="Full Name">
        <Type>Text</Type>
      </semanticmediawiki_Property>
    </Field>
    <Field name="Email">
      <pageforms_FormInput>
        <InputType>text</InputType>
        <Description>username :)</Description>
      </pageforms_FormInput>
      <semanticmediawiki_Property name="Email">
        <Type>Text</Type>
      </semanticmediawiki_Property>
    </Field>
    <Field name="Homepage">
      <pageforms_FormInput>
        <InputType>text</InputType>
      </pageforms_FormInput>
      <semanticmediawiki_Property name="Has URL">
        <Type>URL</Type>
      </semanticmediawiki_Property>
    </Field>
    <Field name="Projects" list="list">
      <pageforms_FormInput>
        <InputType>tokens</InputType>
        <Parameter name="values from category">Project</Parameter>
      </pageforms_FormInput>
      <semanticmediawiki_Property name="Contributes To">
        <Type>Page</Type>
      </semanticmediawiki_Property>
    </Field>
    <Field name="ORCID">
      <pageforms_FormInput>
        <InputType>text</InputType>
      </pageforms_FormInput>
      <semanticmediawiki_Property name="ORCID">
        <Type>External identifier</Type>
      </semanticmediawiki_Property>
    </Field>
    <Field name="eRA">
      <Label>eRA Commons ID</Label>
      <pageforms_FormInput>
        <InputType>text</InputType>
        <Description>Username used to log in, not the numeric "Person ID" in your profile</Description>
      </pageforms_FormInput>
      <semanticmediawiki_Property name="eRA ID">
        <Type>Text</Type>
      </semanticmediawiki_Property>
    </Field>
    <Field name="Twitter">
      <pageforms_FormInput>
        <InputType>text</InputType>
        <Description>(without the @)</Description>
      </pageforms_FormInput>
      <semanticmediawiki_Property name="Twitter Handle">
        <Type>External identifier</Type>
      </semanticmediawiki_Property>
    </Field>
    <Field name="Fediverse" list="list">
      <pageforms_FormInput>
        <InputType>tokens</InputType>
        <Description>Full URL to profile(s), comma separated</Description>
      </pageforms_FormInput>
      <semanticmediawiki_Property name="Fediverse Handle">
        <Type>URL</Type>
      </semanticmediawiki_Property>
    </Field>
    <Field name="Github">
      <pageforms_FormInput>
        <InputType>text</InputType>
        <Description>username :)</Description>
      </pageforms_FormInput>
      <semanticmediawiki_Property name="Github Handle">
        <Type>External identifier</Type>
      </semanticmediawiki_Property>
    </Field>

  </Template>
</PageSchema>

A Lab Member!!!!
